thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Exchange operator Cboe's profit surges near eight-fold

title: Exchange operator Cboe's profit surges near eight-fold
text:
May 4, 2018 / 11:38 AM / in 16 minutes Exchange operator Cboe's profit surges near eight-fold Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 4 (Reuters) - Cboe Global Markets Inc reported a near eight-fold rise in quarterly profit on Friday, as heightened volatility helped drive trading volumes higher.
Net income allocated to common stockholders rose to $117.3 million, or $1.04 per share, in the first quarter ended March 31 from $15.1 million, or 16 cents per share, a year earlier.
Revenue rose to $777.7 million from $356.2 million. Reporting by Nikhil Subba Shailesh Kuber
